questions.question: What is the value of ddx (sin⁡ x3 cos⁡ x2)?

answers.a: 3x2 cos x2 cos⁡ x3 + 2x sin⁡ x3 sin x2
answers.b: 3x2 cos⁡ x2 cos⁡ x3 – 2x sin⁡ x3 sin x2
answers.c: 2x cos x2 cos⁡ x3 – 2x sin⁡ x3 sin x2
answers.d: 2x cos x2 cos⁡ x3 + 3x2 sin⁡ x3 sin x2

questions.question: what is the value of ddx(cos2⁡ x tan⁡ x) at x = 1?
